moves.1. e4:
It'll take me a while to get over the horrible, horrible first game I played. My ego was screwed and I was unconfident...

To whoever saw what I wrote before, I'm sorry, but I got Harzer and Ludwig mixed up. I won against Ludwig, but it was a timeout...
I have nothing but respect for Harzer. He's a nice player!
moves.2. g3: Since I have nothing better to do... FLANCHETTO!
moves.3. c3 e5: NOW he brings out that freakin' pawn...
moves.4. f4 Bd6 5. Ne2 exf4 6. gxf4 Nf6 7. Bg2: Not too sure what he was trying to accomplish there... that pawn wasn't THAT much of a threat, was it?
moves.8... g5 9. Ne2 Qa5 10. O-O Ng4 11. Ng3 h: Knights look better when they can't be captured near the middle of the board, no?
moves.12... c4: I have no idea what he was aiming for... to stop my moving d3 or b3?
moves.13. Nd6+: My knight wants a two-for-one deal >:-3
moves.13... Kd8 14. Nxf7+ Ke7 15. Nxh8 Nce5 16: those knights become a pain in my ass later (for the short run). Watch them.
moves.17. b4: I didn't like half my board not being used. <_<;;
moves.17... Qc7 18. Bf3 g4 19. hxg4 hxg4 20. B: Y'know, that knight combo on the pawn was REALLY annoying me. How considerate of him to move it for me! <3
moves.22. Bh5 Bg4: All I gotta say is W. T. F!?! In order to protect a pawn that wasn't in danger, he let my bishop escape. and to capture my bishop, he throws his at me!
moves.23. Bxg4: Hey, Who am I to not take what's offered to me?
moves.23... Kd6: . . . I have no clue what is going on in this guys head...
moves.24. Bf5: Time to GET THE HELL OUT OF THERE, BISHOP!!
moves.24... Qb6+ 25. d4: En passant or whatever would have REALLY F*cked me over right there. Anyone agree?
moves.25... Nxc3: He Swings and hits the WRONG TARGET...
moves.27. Qe1:
Protect the knight, Attack the knight. 
I am made of WIN tonight!
moves.28... Rg8+ 29. Kf2: run like a chicken with my head cut off!
moves.29... Qb2+ 30. Qd2: I'm perfectly willing to go Queen for Queen at this point. Wouldn't you?
moves.31. Qe3 Qb2+ 32. Ne2 c3 33. Qxe5+ Kc6 34:
I'll Avenge you, my brave, dead knight!
You may be gone, but you are NOT forgotten!!
moves.38... c2: Why? Just WHY?! With two rooks there, all they can promote that pawn to is pain...
moves.39. Kf3 Qa3+: That's a death-trap. That entire area was a kill-zone for the Queen.
moves.41. Qb3#: Now if only Jason could see this...
